document_data.name: Alard Belaerl
document_data.mainbody: '''Alard Belaerl''' was a tavern owner in [[Waterdeep]] around [[1367 DR]].
document_data.Activities: Alard managed the [[Sleeping Snake]] tavern in the [[Dock Ward of Waterdeep]], where it was possible to watch dancers perform. He also sold the services of his dancers as spies to various thieves.
